hrw.swenpr.bomberman.server.thread

Class ClientThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • hrw.swenpr.bomberman.server.thread.ClientThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This thread is started for each client and handles the communication with it
    Author:
    Lukas Jarosch, Marco Egger

        Parameters:

      • handleUserRemove
